comment.caption: Former President Harry S. Truman plays the piano at the Truman Library for Navy personnel
comment.note: During a tour of the Harry S. Truman Library, former President Harry S. Truman plays a tune on the piano for an unidentified Navy officer from the Olathe Naval Air Station in Kansas, while an unidentified civilian looks on. The event and date are unknown. From: Janet Rau.
